bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XXV. Italy VI. Published by Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder and Guglielmo Cavallo.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XXV, 777-798. - En part.: Firenze, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana; - Istituto Papirologico "G. Vitelli".

Bruckner Albert † and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XXV. Italy VI. Published by Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder and Guglielmo Cavallo.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1986, in fol., xi-95 pp., ill.
